meanings.sent1: She felt dreamier than usual after spending the afternoon lost in her thoughts.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in dreamier shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent3: His dreamier nature sometimes made it hard for him to focus on reality.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked even dreamier under the soft glow of the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The music created a dreamier atmosphere, transporting the audience to a magical world.

meanings.definition: More dreamy in appearance or quality.
meanings.sent1: The new painting was even dreamier than the artist's previous works.
meanings.sent2: The actress had a dreamier look about her, captivating everyone in the room.
meanings.sent3: The dreamier clouds seemed to form shapes of mythical creatures in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The dreamier fabric draped elegantly, enhancing the beauty of the dress.
meanings.sent5: The dreamier landscape reminded her of a fairytale she once read.
